HTransparentDialogOnViewportÂ¶

class source.Qt.custom_widget.HTransparentDialogOnViewport(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)Â¶

Create a Custom Qwidget that will follow the maya Viewport while allowing transparency/semiTransparency


Todo

  • Allow to minimize the window to different side (top left, top right, bottom left, bottom right)

Parameters

  • object_name (str) â Name of the window thatâll be created

  • parent (HTransparentDialogOnViewport) â Parent the window to an other HTransparentDialogOnViewport, optional

  • pos (list) â Position where the windows will appear base on the maya viewport, defaults [0,0]

  • size (list) â Default size of the created window , defaults [50,50]

  • visible (bool) â If the windows should be visible when created or not, defaults False

  • orientation (str) â Define the layout orientation onf the window, defaults horizontal

  • opacity (float) â Define the opacity of the window, defaults 0.5

Danger

  • parent need to be a HTransparentDialogOnViewport for it to work

  • orientation only accept âhorizontalâ or âverticalâ

  • opacity value should be contain between 0.0 and 1.0

Example:

import Qt.custom_widget as cstm_widget

TOOL_ICON = QtGui.QIcon(":/images/my_tool_icon.png")

class MyCustomUI(QtCore.QObject):
        def __init__(self):
            super(MyCustomUI, self).__init__()

            # ui creation
            self.main_ui = cstm_widget.HTransparentDialogOnViewport('anim sculpt',
                                                                pos=[10, 10],
                                                                size=[400, 30],
                                                                tool_icon=TOOL_ICON,
                                                                visible=True)
            self.my_button = QtWidgets.QPushButton('press me')

            # to add widget to the main ui use ``main_layout``
            self.main_ui.main_layout.addWidget(self.my_button)


            # to run function when user quit ui use ``ui_leaved``
            self.main_ui.ui_leaved.connect(my_leave_function)

UI = MyCustomUI()
UI.main_ui.show()
